title: Nina Turner on the Future of Progressive Politics, Plus - Why Networks Air Trump’s Pressers in Full
description:
Former Ohio State Senator Nina Turner discusses the future of progressive politics in America after Sanders suspended his campaign. Katie and Matt learn about Biden’s fig newton affinity, and discover some of the most creative DIY protective-wear that people have developed during the pandemic. Also, Taibbi's take on the real reason news networks have been airing Trump's Covid-19 press conferences in full. Hint: Money

Merch link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
